title: 強烈要求聯合國維和部隊接管香港，直至主權獨立

replies.msg:
犬隻違反 日內瓦公約
https://www.ohchr.org/CH/AboutUs/Pages/ContactUs.aspx
聯合國支那控制晒

quote.msg: 聯合國支那控制晒

replies.msg:
To whom it may concern,

Today, 12th June 2019, many protestors in Hong Kong assemble, expressing the objection towards the extradition bill, which is proposed by the Hong Kong government. We are not commenting on the extradition bill here, but to express our strong opposition regarding the force used by the Hong Kong police.

The assembly begins at night, 11th June 2019. The assembly is peaceful all along. The protestors are unarmed, only carrying umbrellas or wearing helmets and face masks to protect themselves. The number of policemen increases time to time, and they are carrying with guns and tear gas. However, at around HKT 3pm, 12th June 2019, the Hong Kong police has escalated their action, using tear gas and shooting rubber. Not only shown in the live report from the journalists, but also admitted by the head of the police officers in the press. The tear gas has caused eye irritations of numerous protestors. A number of protestors, journalists were hurt by the rubber shooting from the police also, noting that one of the patient has lost his consciousness as reported. We are here to express our strong opposition and anger towards the Hong Kong police and would like to raise the awareness from the whole world, particularly hoping the UN can help the citizens in Hong Kong, by imposing pressure to the Hong Kong government and the Hong Kong police to stop these unnecessary, and yet inhumane actions.

quote.msg: 聯合國支那控制晒
聯合國支那控制晒

replies.msg:
